column4: hi all, my dads pc is fscked up, when it boots it says there are illegal blocks etc and fsck wants to clear them, how must i fix this???
if anyone can help i would be very appreciative, this is a big problem :(

/ csilk: it says there are invalid blocks must it clear <y>? if i say yes it asks again, after a while it says theres too many invalid blocks, must it clear all <y>? - i have already cleared quite alot but im scared im gonna lose data?? :/
well, you may lose data I don't know. It Looks like you hdd has alot of badblocks
